column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I had been out working in the garden and was quite dirty , so I decided to take a bath .
#id=2
#text=I went into the bathroom and plugged the hole , so the water would fill up .
#id=3
#text=I turned on the hot water and I turned on the cold water until it was a pleasant temperature .
#id=4
#text=I added some bubble bath to the water and let the tub fill all the way up .
#id=5
#text=I got undressed and stepped into the bath tub .
#id=6
#text=I used soap and a washcloth to clean myself .
#id=7
#text=I used shampoo to clean my hair then I put conditioner in , so that my hair would be soft and silky .
#id=8
#text=I let the conditioner soak in for awhile and then I rinsed it out .
#id=9
#text=I rinsed off the soap from my body and got out of the tub .
#text=I grabbed a towel and dried off .
#text=Then I got dressed and went about my day .
